regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 count=3;pn=1;data=[] while pn <= int(count): source=requests.get('https://dak1vd5vmi7x6.cloudfront.net/api/v1/publicrole/showmodule/list?genre=&pageNumber=str(pn)&pageSize=35&sortBy=latest',headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'https://www.manototv.com/shows'},cookies=Cookie_Jar).content#json()['details']['list'] data +=re.findall('slideID":(\d+).+?Title":"([^"]+).+?Url":"([^"]+)',source);pn +=1 return data

regex.name: getUrl
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,stream='[makelist3.param1]'):#streamwatcher2013 if 'videoclip' in stream: source=requests.get('https://dak1vd5vmi7x6.cloudfront.net/api/v1/publicrole/showmodule/videoclipdetails?id=[makelist3.param2]',headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'https://www.manototv.com/clip/[makelist3.param2]'},cookies=Cookie_Jar) return source.json()['details']['videoM3u8Url']+'|user-agent=ipad&referer=https://www.manototv.com/clip/[makelist3.param2]' else: source=requests.get('https://dak1vd5vmi7x6.cloudfront.net/api/v1/publicrole/showmodule/episodedetails?id=[makelist3.param2]',headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0','referer':'https://www.manototv.com/episode/[makelist3.param2]'},cookies=Cookie_Jar) return source.json()['details']['videoM3u8Url']+'|user-agent=ipad&referer=https://www.manototv.com/episode/[makelist3.param2]'
